mapper.select:
SELECT MCD.COMPANY_CD , MCD.COMPANY_NM , MCD.DIVISION_CD , MCD.DIVISION_NM , MSC.SO_TYPE , MSC.SO_TYPE_NM , MSC.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MSC.COMPANY_CD,MSC.DIVISION_CD, MSC.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , MSC.USE_YN , MSC.DESCRIPTION , MSC.UPDATE_BY , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MSC.COMPANY_CD, MSC.DIVISION_CD, MSC.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_BY_NM , TO_CHAR(MSC.UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , MSC.SO_TYPE || '_' || MSC.IO_TYPE AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_SO_CATEGORY MSC WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MSC.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MSC.DIVISION_CD
AND MSC.SO_TYPE IN (${soType})
AND MSC.IO_TYPE IN (${ioType})
AND MSC.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY MCD.COMPANY_NM, MCD.DIVISION_NM, MSC.SO_TYPE_NM
